AD.name: Number of nodes
AD.description: Enter number of nodes in the network, must be > 0

AD.name: Number to keep in Cache
AD.description: Enter number of nodes to be kept in the cache, must be > 0

AD.description: Enter minimum degree of nodes allowed, must be > 0

AD.description: Enter maximum degree of nodes allowed, must be > 0
